The Coptic language is most important for the study of ancient Egyptian.

ğ… Strange epsilon letter between Y,V,W,R,G! ğŒ°ğŒ¹ğ…=ever (ğ…:VR/WG:â²©) ğŒ°ğŒ¹ğ…=ewig in gothic
